questions.question: __________ instruction is used to program a time delay to begin after rung input goes false.
In timer element, word 0 is for ________

Statement 1: In SLC PLC series, timer can be assigned for any unused file from 9 to 255.
Statement 2: There are 256 timers available in each file. Timers 0 through 255 are available

answers.c: Both statement 1 and statement 2 are false
answers.d: Both statement 1 and statement 2 are true

questions.question: In word zero, of timer element, bit 14, is the _______
In timer file 11, timer 6's timer enable bit is addressed as _______ .
In the figure, _________ is set when the rung 000 becomes true. It will remain set through the true to false transition and until the accumulated value is equal to the preset value.
